| History                 = The United States Army was summoned by [[Rex Carpenter (Counter-Earth) (Earth-616)|President Carpenter]] to confront [[Adam Warlock (Earth-616)|Warlock]].{{r|Warlock Vol 1 6}}

The Army was then summoned by the [[Man-Beast (Earth-616)|Man-Beast]] to fight the Hulk.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 178}}
